attributes.action: 12 ban for use of mobile (hand held)phones while driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Drivers caught useing a mobile phone,with only one hand on the steering wheel,should recieve a minimum of 12 months (1 year) ban,from driving any motor vehicle on uk roads.
the amount of accidents caused by drivers not fully in control of there vehicle has risen drasticaly, despite the introduction of new laws making it illegal.
